conflicts.description: Parallel deadlock detected: Role "A" send messages in multiple parallel branches, which may cause blocking. A role cannot send in concurrent branches as it would require the role to act simultaneously. Review parallel_id "par0" to ensure branch independence.

Circular dependency detected in parallel branches: Branch 0 (role B) waits for message from Branch 1, while Branch 1 (role C) waits for message from Branch 0. This creates a deadlock where both branches are blocked waiting for each other. Parallel_id: "par0".

races.description: Race condition: Role "A" involved in concurrent operations across parallel branches. Branch 1: [A → B: M1], Branch 2: [A → C: M2]. This may cause non-deterministic behavior.
